description:
Thief Life Simulator throws you into the shadows of a living, breathing city where every decision matters. In a world full of surveillance, locked doors, and tight schedules, your job is simple: get in, steal everything you can, and get out—without leaving a trace. Choose your targets, plan carefully, use cutting-edge tech or classic methods to break in, steal, and vanish without a trace.

Key Features:
	•	Start small with pickpocketing and garages, rise to luxury mansion break-ins.
	•	Every action has consequences. Be fast or get caught.
	•	Advanced mechanics for lockpicking, stealth, and infiltration.
	•	From rookie to professional thief, every step is a risky choice.
	•	Get in, clean out, disappear. No trace left behind.

Will you climb the criminal ladder or end up behind bars?
Thief Life Simulator – Where every hit matters.
